\ This application aims to connect objects of an apartment. Its menu is composed of somes options:

 		 READING MODE 
 In read mode you can only move objects for the readability of the network of connected objects. Place your finger on an object and move the finger to move the object. If you want to create objects or connections then you have to switch to creation mode. 


		 CREATION MODE 
 In creation mode you can create or modify objects and their connections. When you are in creation mode, A long touch of the plan of the apartment allows you to create an object. Place your finger on an object and move the finger to draw a connection. In design mode you cannot move objects, so you must switch to reading mode to do so. A click on an object allows to open the parameters of this object and to modify it, click on the middle of a connection to do the same. 




 IMPORT A PLAN option allows you to import your own apartment plan. 

 The other menu options are self-explanatory.
